content:
Hi,

Is there any way where we can generate C# classes using Structure Definition with help of FHIR .NET Library?

Thanks
Not really....but the classes are already all in the library...so not sure why that would be needed?

They are generated using T4 templates that are in the source code. Some have manually added new resources to the profiles-resources.xml file in the Generated\Source directory in the Hl7.Fhir.Core project and then run the templates - that should get you your own local flavor of FHIR.

I also did a rough write-up on custom fhir resources - the why and why not and what could work
https://brianpos.com/2018/05/03/code-generation-fhir-custom-resources/
